definition.name: NavigationMenu
definition.description: A top-level navigation menu component that provides a container for navigation items. Built on top of Radix UI's Navigation Menu primitive.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the navigation menu

children.description: The content to be rendered within the navigation menu

definition.visualLayout: A horizontal container that centers its content and manages the z-index stacking context for dropdown menus

definition.name: NavigationMenuList
definition.description: A container for navigation menu items that arranges them in a horizontal list with proper spacing.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the list

definition.visualLayout: A horizontal flex container that centers its items and adds consistent spacing between them

definition.name: NavigationMenuItem
definition.description: A container for individual navigation items that can contain a trigger and content.
definition.visualLayout: A wrapper component that groups related navigation elements together

metadata.name: navigationMenuTriggerStyle
metadata.description: A class variance authority (cva) function that generates consistent styling for navigation menu triggers. Includes styles for various states including hover, focus, active, and disabled states.

definition.name: NavigationMenuTrigger
definition.description: A button that triggers the display of navigation menu content, featuring a chevron indicator that rotates when the content is open.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the trigger

children.description: The content to be displayed in the trigger button

definition.visualLayout: A button with text content and a chevron icon that rotates 180 degrees when activated
interactions: Chevron rotates 180 degrees when content is open

definition.name: NavigationMenuContent
definition.description: The dropdown content that appears when a navigation menu trigger is activated. Provides animated transitions and responsive positioning.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the content

definition.visualLayout: A dropdown panel that animates in/out with fade and slide effects, positioned absolutely on desktop and full-width on mobile

definition.name: NavigationMenuLink
definition.description: A clickable link element within the navigation menu that can be used for direct navigation without dropdowns.
definition.visualLayout: A styled link component that integrates with the navigation menu's visual design

definition.name: NavigationMenuViewport
definition.description: A container that holds and animates the navigation menu content, providing a consistent viewing area for dropdown content with smooth animations.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the viewport

definition.visualLayout: A positioned container with a border and shadow that animates content in and out using zoom effects

definition.name: NavigationMenuIndicator
definition.description: A visual indicator that shows which navigation item is currently active or open, displayed as a small arrow pointing to the active item.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the indicator

definition.visualLayout: A small rotated square shape that serves as an arrow indicator, with fade animations for showing/hiding
